Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'And last but not leastâ€”let me go over our battle plan one more time!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Engineering Force will help us activate any working elevators in the mine, while Lucia and Gray Raven Commandant lead everyone to the designated location.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Once you reach your position, start reinforcing the mine tunnels immediately to prevent any cave-ins. And no slacking off!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I'll take a different route down and guard the rear to make sure no Corrupted can get through to you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: 'Hey, count me in, too!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Alright, alright! Just focus on reinforcing those mine tunnels. Don't make it sound like I'm going on some suicide mission here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I'm more than qualified to be in Task Force, in case you didn't know!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Get going now. When I catch up with you all, I'll be inspecting your reinforcement work, so you better do it right!", 4: '1'}
